title: Carlos Lago (Edmunds Road Noise)
description:
Carlos Lago is a friend, excellent driver, and the Feature Content Manager at Edmunds.com. You can see his work on their youtube channel or at edmund.com/roadnoise

https://www.edmunds.com/roadnoise/

Get the audio-only version of this show wherever you get podcasts (iTunes, Googleplay, etc) or get it from our source page:

 

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/ibabqiLf_lI

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @carloslago6 

 

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/tst
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
